channel.title: Bankai/Cobra Kai
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Bankai/Cobra Kai"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
8 iulie 2017 - 9 minute citite - 1873 cuvinte
The header image for this post was created by DeviantArt user Annika-86, the original version is available here

🎁♟ 🐧♝ 👣🍧 ♤♚ 💚🍩 ➁０２ʘ年３月➂ѳ日月曜日 🐼✋ 🎁ൠ 💛🎃 ♙😳 ♟🐒

I try not to be a threatening spectre, but the scythe obssessive whose been running Clarste's body for all these years really hasn't been playing along correctly, so I'll show him a just why exactly those borrowed powers struggle so hard against him if he's not constantly "fiddling with the wiring" or to be more honest, damning the caddyshack everytime he plays this ridiculous [place of personal abandonment]. Hands off, you're quick, but you're honestly the real bore.

"You sound like you really don't like waffles?"

item.title: Re: Bankai/Cobra Kai
item.content:encoded: I can confirm that Bankai potions can be mixed in Cobrakai.

item.title: Bankai/Cobra Kai
item.content:encoded:
Can i mix rare stuff only while on Bankai, or can i use the "better" cobra kai too?

thanks:)
